website_summaries.verdict: An adjustable bed that features a deluxe upholstered steel frame, independent head incline, and other great features.
pros: Simple to assemble in just minutes
Boasts dual USB charging stations on both sides of the bed's base
Offers three programmable memory options so you can quickly adjust the bed to your preferred position
Provides a weight capacity of 750 pounds
cons: The bed's parts tend to be heavy and awkward to handle during assembly

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Unpacked and assembled yesterday and my wife slept on it last night. A few of the legs did not thread smoothly into the fame but might have just had paint in the threads. Motors operate smoothly and legs have a good range of height adjustment. Love the lights and USB ports on both sides (allows placement against a wall). Heavy and awkward to handle but once assembled all is good. Will update this review after more use.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M.

customer_reviews.title: mattress america adjustible bed frame full size
customer_reviews.text: I like this frame because its half the price of the major brands with more options & very sturdy after sleeping in a recliner for several years its nice to be sleeping in abed again I am over 300 lbs. I highly recommend this frame.
customer_reviews.author: sdawg

customer_reviews.title: I love this base
customer_reviews.text: I love this base! It does a great job. I can raise my head, my feet, and massage myself to sleep! The only assembly I had to do was to screw on the legs, plug in the power box, and plug it into the outlet!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Sherrick

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Although heavy, had to get it up the stairs, the set up was very easy. But too bad after 40 days one of the motors went out and the head no longer raises!! Amazon was no help as the seller only had a 30 day guarantee!! The seller wanted me to get under the bed and look at the motor to tell them what is wrong so they could send me a replacement part. I am a single female that has no idea about any motors nothing is detached so how else would I know what’s wrong? Just ridiculous I would never do this again this guarantee is worth nothing!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SDT

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: This adjustable bed frame has exceeded my expectations, and his holding up well after 1 year of use. Pros: inexpensive, sturdy, reliable--does what it is supposed to do. Cons: the remote control lights are so bright that it lights up the room when you push a button. Also, the lights on the USB charging ports are very bright--had to cover them with black tape.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Everything you'd want at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped in a decent box so everything was in perfect condition. All we had to do was screw on the legs less then 5 min and it was ready to use. We must have gotten a new version of the remote because it has the zero gravity setting. This frame does everything for about $300. less then you'd spend in the mattres stores. It's heavy so it took both of us to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd B.

customer_reviews.title: Great service Mattress America!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Adjustable bed in Feb 2020. Jul 22 2020 while Raising the head and the motor just stopped in raised position. Called Mattress America at 801 676-7615 and talked with Brad. He is a wonderful person with lots of patience. Following his direction my bed was back to working in a short time. My remote had to be reprogrammed to the bed. Thank you so much Brad. I hope everyone at Mattress America are as awesome as you are.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Voss

customer_reviews.title: Just what we hoped for... and more!
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoy these adjustable bed frames. My wife felt the frame was too low to the floor, but that's a standard height and was easily corrected with 3" lift. The under lighting and massage features create a spa-like feeling, and the vibrating leg and body feel great to wind down from the day and caught some great initial reactions from our pets. They are heavy duty and my wife adds... they are not a 5 minute setup... 15. :)
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Best 500$ I have ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Best 500$ I have ever spent. Sleep better then I ever have and wish I would have bought it sooner. I never usually write reviews but this product is definitely worth it. Great massage (three modes with 10-30 minute timer), 5 position buttons programmed in, night flash light built in on the controller, lights built in under the bed, use the USB chargers every night for my iPad and iPhone, half the price of adjustable frames at mattress locations. Hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: kyle person

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, But Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Warning: it is heavy. You will need two able-bodied people to lift it and turn it over to the correct position. We had to hire handymen. They had no trouble setting it up. That being said, it is pretty cool to use. It fit perfectly in our Queen bedframe so we can use the headboard. The exact same frame sells for $300 more from a mattress retailer we checked out, and it still would have been delivered in the box. These sell for over a grand in the furniture stores. I really like the zero gravity position and massage feature.
customer_reviews.author: Sherilee

customer_reviews.title: Great frame, just to low
customer_reviews.text: I like the frame, and the vibration works well! I loved the lights under the bed. The bed was too low to for my elderly mother. The remote had to many options for her. The adjustable legs are a great idea but still low and no way of raising them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to have help setting it up. It weights about 150 pounds! Raising the head and feet makes it easier to move once you have it together and up-right.
customer_reviews.author: Grover

customer_reviews.title: An awesome value at any price!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several furniture stores locally and was very surprised that they are basic model that just raises and lowers and doesn’t do anything else was much more expensive than this unit which was delivered right to my door and has many features.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted an adjustable bed. He loves it. It arrives in a large box that is super heavy. The box was pretty torn up, but the bed was unharmed. It was easy to put on the legs and get it set up.
customer_reviews.author: CptKat

customer_reviews.title: Since my back problem the most comfortable bed I’ve ever slept on.
customer_reviews.text: This is a phenomenal adjustable base. After 12 years I have solved my wife’s snoring. 😎
customer_reviews.author: Daine Hj Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: Have only had the bed one night but it exceeds my expectations so far. The bed frame arrives almost completely set up. All i had to do was screw the legs on and plug it in. It will take longer to get the area clear and the box opened than it takes to set this bed frame up. It is not a one person job so have some help.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. We love ours. Very easy set up. Comfortable. Everything works.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It is heavy,but the easiest thing to put together for someone like me who wasn’t too sure. The instructions tell you that you need to hook something up for the massage part but on both of my frames it was already hooked up.
customer_reviews.author: Randi B.

customer_reviews.title: Mattress compatability is something to look into before purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: The base itself is great. The only down side is the amount of noise it makes when the massage feature is on. With that being said I also did not have the TV on like I normally would so I'm sure it won't be as loud after all.
customer_reviews.author: Angela DiMino

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my son who spends a lot of time in the bed watching tv. There have been no complaints since we got it. It was easy to set up and has worked perfectly so far.

customer_reviews.title: Solid adjustable mattress base
customer_reviews.text: Love this adjustable mattress base. Easy to set up. Vibration is ok.
